title: Turkey, bacon and wild rice soup
ingredients: ['1L chicken stock', '475ml water', '50g finely chopped spring onions', '80g uncooked wild rice', '8 rashers streaky bacon', '100g bacon', '100g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon herb seasoning', '1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper', '475ml single cream', '225g cooked turkey, chopped or shredded', '2 tablespoons dry sherry']
